Do not allow local in-browser account st: Do not allow local in-browser account storage
It is recommended that you store all key: It is recommended that you store all keys externally to the in-page browser local storage, either on browser extensions, signers operating via QR codes or hardware devices. This option is provided for advanced users with strong backup policies.
Ledger hardware device support is only a: Ledger hardware device support is only available on Chromium-based browsers where WebUSB and WebHID support is available in the browser.
Ledger support is still experimental and: Ledger support is still experimental and some issues may remain. Trust, but verify the addresses on your devices before transferring large amounts. There are some features that will not work, including batch calls (used extensively in staking and democracy) as well as any identity operations.
